document_data.title: Silence Going for Death
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Silence Going for Death''''' is an adventure in the [[Living City]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 3{{rd}} edition.

{{Quote|A bard, the temple of Sune and the forces of evil. Your assistance is not by choice, it is your fate. But why does it feel so ominous?}}
